name: Gerald A. STEIN, Appellant, v. Thomas Davis SCHNEIDER, Appellee

judges: MONTEMURO, J., is sitting by designation as senior justice pursuant to Judicial Assignment Docket No. 94 R1800 due to the unavailability of LARSEN, J.; see No. 127 Judicial Administration Docket No. 1, filed October 28, 1993.
parties: Gerald A. STEIN, Appellant, v. Thomas Davis SCHNEIDER, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 18th day of MAY, 1994, the transfer of appellant’s appeal is refused and the matter returned to the Superior Court.
MONTEMURO, J., is sitting by designation as senior justice pursuant to Judicial Assignment Docket No. 94 R1800 due to the unavailability of LARSEN, J.; see No. 127 Judicial Administration Docket No. 1, filed October 28, 1993.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: John Joergensen, Philadelphia, for G. Stein.
casebody.head_matter:
652 A.2d 280
Gerald A. STEIN, Appellant, v. Thomas Davis SCHNEIDER, Appellee.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
May 18, 1994.
John Joergensen, Philadelphia, for G. Stein.
Thomas Schneider, pro se.
